name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A Wuhan citizen who had previously reported the problem online was stopped by two unidentified men on the morning of the 15th before he was about to go out and was restricted from traveling.
The two men did not show their IDs and claimed to be security company personnel arranged by the community.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@torontobigface Attentive netizens must have discovered it
Many patriotic influencers live in Europe, America, Japan and South Korea, and no matter how bad they are, they still work as translators. What does it mean? This is a team organized by the CIA. On the one hand, it promotes populist ideas, and on the other hand, it guides the people to decouple from the world.
Attempting to fundamentally undermine the Belt and Road Initiative and the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation
Everyone has seen it in the past few years, and they have achieved remarkable results.
But now something happened in their hometown, which made them show their fox tail.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 16, several flights that were scheduled to fly to Shijiazhuang Zhengding Airport were diverted to other nearby airports, which attracted attention.
That afternoon, a reporter learned from the Shijiazhuang Zhengding Airport service hotline that the information obtained from the airport system showed that the relevant situation was due to other airspace users occupying the airspace, not due to weather reasons. At present, flights at Shijiazhuang Zhengding Airport have been taking off and landing normally.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up progress: The reason was that a balloon was found

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Some banks in Nanning offer "relay loans" with the upper limit extended to 100 years old, and children as co-borrowers.
Now, loans can also be passed down from generation to generation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing has also raised mortgage payments to 95 years old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of February 16, about 200 elderly people gathered in Wuhan Zhongshan Park to discuss the issue of medical insurance reform.
There were not many police officers at the scene, and no interference was made. However, a subway station entrance and exit was closed with water barriers.
Then the people dispersed on their own.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @BitRunX Forget Wuhan, I can’t even get into Fengxian

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Many Wuhan netizens submitted articles saying that they received a group text message from the Hubei Medical Insurance Bureau today.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the 16th, the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee held a meeting to hear a report on the recent COVID-19 prevention and control work. The meeting pointed out: We have achieved a major and decisive victory in epidemic prevention and control.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Judging from the current number of submissions, most Wuhan citizens should have received the mass messages from the Medical Insurance Bureau, and several of them were sent in a row.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xinhua News Agency has just released China's sanctions against Lockheed Martin and Raytheon Missiles & Defense.
1. Prohibit imports and exports with China.
2. Prohibit new investment in China.
3. Prohibit entry of senior executives.
4. Do not approve and cancel the work permit, stay and residence permit of senior executives in China.
5. Fine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
I saw a drill video on WeChat video account, the specific time is unknown
But it can be seen that the relevant departments have conducted targeted training on how to deal with behaviors such as holding up white paper.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 16, a surveillance video of a group of people in Hunan Province getting into a dispute after drinking and slashing people with knives was circulated online, which caused heated discussion.
The video showed that at around 1 a.m. on February 14, in Jishou City, Hunan Province, a group of young people were having a dispute with young people who were eating at the next table while eating at a barbecue restaurant, and a physical conflict occurred.
One of the men ran to the road outside the barbecue restaurant to avoid it, but was still chased and beaten by several people on the street and slashed several times.
